All functions

SOfun-package

Functions written while answering Stack Overflow questions

SampleToSum()

TabulateInt()

Allows Tabulate to Be Used with Negative Integers Too

TriIndex()

Get the row and column indices of upper and lower trianges of a matrix

naLast()
